name: googlebooks-app
description: This is a full stack homework 21, transforming a MERN stack into a MARGN(?) Mongodb, Apollo Server, React, Graphql, and Node.js. README.md 1. Set up an Apollo Server to use GraphQL queries and mutations to fetch and modify data, replacing the existing RESTful API.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
